cleaned_text: Our story How we got our start Yuve was born out of one woman's desire to be healthy, vibrant and thriving once AGAIN... Several years ago, our founder began her healing journey through a plant-based diet. She achieved amazing results and wanted to help others benefit from their own wellness transformation as well. What makes our product unique We stand out from the crowd with proven, tested and sustainably sourced and animal-free ingredients that you'll actually want to put in your body. Yuve, which means "youth" is the best partner in your path to self-love, healing and transformation.
